video-editor.title: Video Editor
video-editor.tagline: AI cuts the footage. Humans tell the story.

tasks.description: AI auto-edits raw footage into rough cuts based on script, speech patterns, and visual cues.
AI applies cinematic color grades and matches shots for consistent look across sequences.
AI generates accurate multi-language subtitles with auto-formatting and timing.
AI removes background noise, normalizes levels, and generates music beds automatically.
AI applies transitions and generates basic motion graphics but complex VFX needs human artistry.
AI identifies highlights and creates TikTok/Reels/Shorts from long-form content automatically.
Pacing, emotional arc, tension building, and narrative structure require human creative vision.
Understanding client feedback, interpreting vague direction, and managing expectations is human.
Original video concepts, storyboarding, and creative direction require human imagination.

companies.name: Descript
companies.threat: Edit video by editing text — AI handles cuts, filler removal, and eye contact correction

companies.name: Runway
companies.threat: AI video generation and editing that creates footage from text descriptions

companies.name: Opus Clip
companies.threat: AI that turns long videos into viral short-form clips automatically

companies.name: Adobe
companies.threat: AI-powered editing tools that auto-edit, color grade, and enhance footage

companies.name: CapCut
companies.threat: Free AI video editor that handles everything from cuts to effects to captions

timeline.description: AI handles 60% of editing tasks. Editors focus on storytelling and creative decisions. Short-form content nearly automated.
AI produces broadcast-quality edits. Human editors become creative directors and narrative specialists.
Standard editing is fully automated. Human editors focus on premium storytelling, documentary, and cinematic work.

skills.description: Master pacing, emotional arcs, and visual storytelling — the deeply human craft AI can't replicate.
10x your output by mastering AI editing tools — become a one-person production studio.
Complex visual effects and motion design — higher-value, harder to automate skills.
Audio storytelling, sound effects, and music editing add layers AI struggles with.
Move beyond editing to producing — plan, shoot, and deliver complete video projects.

photographer.title: Photographer
photographer.tagline: AI generates the image. Humans capture the moment.

tasks.description: AI generates any stock photo concept instantly, devastating the stock photography market.
AI generates product shots on any background, though physical product detail still needs real shoots.
AI handles skin retouching, background replacement, and color correction with one click.
AI generates realistic headshots but high-end portrait work requires human connection and artistry.
Capturing real moments at weddings, events, and conferences requires physical human presence.
AI enhances and stages real estate photos but physical shoots for high-end listings still need humans.
Art direction, creative concepts, and visual storytelling require human artistic vision.
Building rapport, making subjects comfortable, and delivering a memorable experience is human.

companies.name: Midjourney
companies.threat: Photorealistic AI images replacing stock, product, and concept photography

companies.name: Adobe
companies.threat: AI image generation and editing integrated into Photoshop and Lightroom

companies.name: Shutterstock
companies.threat: Stock photo platform now generates images on demand, undercutting photographers

companies.name: Photoroom
companies.threat: AI product photography tool replacing studio shoots for e-commerce

companies.name: Getty Images
companies.threat: AI-generated commercially safe images replacing traditional stock photography

timeline.description: Stock photography devastated. AI handles product and headshot photography for small businesses. Event and premium work still human.
AI generates photorealistic images for most commercial needs. Photographers pivot to experiences and premium artistry.
Commercial photography largely AI-generated. Human photographers focus on events, fine art, documentary, and experience-based work.

skills.description: Physical presence, human connection, and moment capture — AI can't attend the wedding.
Add video production to your toolkit — clients want photo + video packages.
Use AI for editing, retouching, and delivery — shoot 10x more efficiently.
Artistic photography with personal vision and gallery representation — the premium tier.
Aerial, underwater, industrial — specialized skills that require physical expertise.

motion-graphics-designer.title: Motion Graphics Designer
motion-graphics-designer.tagline: AI animates the graphics. Humans choreograph the story.

tasks.description: AI generates animated titles, lower thirds, and text overlays from templates and descriptions.
AI creates logo reveal animations and brand idents from static logo files.
AI generates animated social posts, stories, and ads from static designs.
AI animates charts and data but complex narrative data storytelling needs human direction.
AI generates basic explainer animations from scripts but polished work needs human refinement.
AI handles basic character movement but expressive, personality-driven animation needs human animators.
Multi-layer compositing, particle effects, and complex visual effects require expert craftsmanship.
Conceptualizing motion design narratives and directing animation style requires creative vision.

companies.name: Runway
companies.threat: AI video and motion generation from text, transforming the motion design pipeline

companies.name: Jitter
companies.threat: AI-powered motion design tool that animates Figma designs automatically

companies.name: Synthesia
companies.threat: AI-generated presenter videos replacing many explainer and training animations

companies.name: Adobe
companies.threat: AI-powered keyframing, rotoscoping, and motion tracking reducing manual animation work

companies.name: Kling AI
companies.threat: Text-to-video generation creating high-quality animated content from descriptions

timeline.description: AI handles 55% of motion graphics tasks. Designers focus on complex animation and creative direction.
AI generates broadcast-quality motion graphics. Human designers become animation directors and VFX specialists.
Standard motion graphics fully automated. Humans focus on cinematic VFX, interactive experiences, and spatial design.

skills.description: 3D motion design is harder to automate and commands premium rates.
WebGL, Three.js, and real-time graphics for apps and immersive experiences.
Master AI tools to produce 5x more content — become a one-person animation studio.
Sync audio and motion — the multi-sensory skill that elevates motion graphics.
Motion design for AR/VR experiences — the next frontier of the discipline.

illustrator.title: Illustrator
illustrator.tagline: AI generates the art. Humans create the vision.

tasks.description: AI generates multiple concept variations from descriptions, dramatically speeding up ideation.
AI generates any illustration style — flat, isometric, watercolor — on demand at scale.
AI creates custom illustrations for posts, headers, and campaigns from prompts.
AI generates icon sets and UI illustrations but brand-consistent custom work needs human refinement.
AI generates editorial art but conceptual depth, satire, and cultural commentary need human creativity.
AI generates character concepts but personality-driven, consistent character design needs human artistry.
AI generates styles but maintaining character consistency and emotional storytelling across pages needs humans.
Original artistic voice, cultural commentary, and personal creative expression remain deeply human.
Understanding client vision, interpreting feedback, and building creative relationships is human.

companies.name: Midjourney
companies.threat: Generates stunning illustrations in any style from text — the biggest threat to illustrators

companies.name: Adobe
companies.threat: AI vector generation and style transfer integrated into the industry-standard illustration tool

companies.name: Stability AI
companies.threat: Open-source AI image generation enabling mass illustration production

companies.name: OpenAI
companies.threat: Multi-modal AI that generates and edits illustrations with conversational refinement

companies.name: Leonardo AI
companies.threat: AI illustration platform with fine-tuned models for specific art styles

timeline.description: AI devastates stock illustration market. Custom illustration work shrinks. Artists who embrace AI tools thrive.
AI handles most commercial illustration. Human illustrators focus on premium art, character design, and children's books.
Commercial illustration fully automated. Human illustrators are fine artists, creative directors, and experience designers.

skills.description: Master AI image generation tools — become the creative director of AI output, not a competitor.
Create memorable characters with personality and consistency — still requires human artistry.
Bring illustrations to life — animated illustration commands premium rates.
Blender, Cinema 4D — 3D illustration is harder to automate and increasingly in demand.
Build a recognizable style and audience — the creator economy rewards unique human vision.

voice-actor.title: Voice Actor
voice-actor.tagline: AI clones the voice. Humans deliver the performance.

tasks.description: AI generates natural phone system voices in any language, eliminating studio recording for IVR.
AI generates clear, engaging narration for training videos and courses in multiple languages.
AI generates passable audiobook narration but character voices and emotional range still lag humans.
AI-generated podcast voices sound natural but lack personality and spontaneous human connection.
AI handles standard commercials but premium brand campaigns still prefer human talent.
AI assists with NPC dialogue but lead character performances need human emotional range.
Distinctive character voices, comedic timing, and emotional depth require human performers.
Live voice work, improv, and in-studio direction with creative teams is irreplaceably human.

companies.name: ElevenLabs
companies.threat: Ultra-realistic AI voice synthesis and cloning — the biggest threat to voice actors

companies.name: WellSaid Labs
companies.threat: Enterprise AI voice platform replacing corporate voice-over work

companies.name: Replica Studios
companies.threat: AI voice actors for games and interactive media

companies.name: Murf AI
companies.threat: AI voice generator for e-learning, marketing, and presentation narration

companies.name: Google
companies.threat: AI-generated podcast conversations from any source material

timeline.description: AI replaces 60% of routine voice work. IVR and e-learning markets collapse for human actors. Premium work persists.
AI voice quality indistinguishable from human. Legal battles over voice rights intensify. Union protections matter.
Most commercial voice work AI-generated. Human voice actors focus on performance art, premium brands, and creative direction.

skills.description: Distinctive characters with emotional depth — the performance AI can approximate but not truly create.
Direct AI voices and human performers — the creative vision behind the performance.
License your voice to AI platforms — monetize your voice as a digital asset.
Live voice work, hosting, and performance — the irreplaceable physical presence.
Combine voice skills with video, podcast, and social media — be a creator, not just a voice.

digital-marketer.title: Digital Marketer
digital-marketer.tagline: AI runs the campaigns. Humans craft the strategy.

tasks.description: AI auto-bids, optimizes ad placement, and adjusts budgets across Google and Meta in real-time.
AI generates ad copy, images, and video variations optimized for different audiences and platforms.
AI builds and optimizes audience segments using behavioral data and lookalike modeling.
AI generates comprehensive marketing reports with insights, attribution, and recommendations.
AI runs continuous A/B tests, auto-promotes winners, and suggests next experiments.
AI writes, personalizes, and optimizes email campaigns with predictive send time.
Defining target markets, positioning, channel strategy, and budget allocation requires business judgment.
Creating differentiated brand positioning requires market insight and creative strategy.
Building distribution partnerships, affiliate networks, and strategic alliances is relationship-driven.

companies.name: Google
companies.threat: AI-driven campaign management across all Google properties with minimal human input

companies.name: Meta
companies.threat: End-to-end AI ad campaigns — targeting, creative, and optimization all automated

companies.name: Albert AI
companies.threat: Autonomous digital marketing AI that runs campaigns independently

companies.name: HubSpot
companies.threat: AI-powered marketing automation covering content, email, and campaign management

companies.name: Jasper
companies.threat: AI-generated marketing content, campaigns, and strategy recommendations

timeline.description: AI handles 70% of campaign execution. Digital marketers focus on strategy and creative direction.
AI manages full campaign lifecycles. Marketers become brand strategists and growth architects.
Routine digital marketing fully automated. Human marketers focus on brand building, partnerships, and creative strategy.

skills.description: Define go-to-market strategy, target markets, and competitive positioning — the strategic layer.
Orchestrate AI marketing tools, interpret results, and make strategic adjustments.
Build emotional brand connections that drive loyalty beyond algorithmic optimization.
Advanced attribution, marketing mix modeling, and predictive analytics — the analytical edge.
Drive product-led growth, launch strategies, and cross-functional go-to-market execution.

seo-specialist.title: SEO Specialist
seo-specialist.tagline: AI writes the content. But search itself is being replaced by AI.

tasks.description: AI identifies keyword opportunities, search volumes, and difficulty scores at massive scale.
AI writes SEO-optimized articles with proper keyword density, headers, and internal linking.
AI crawls sites and identifies technical issues — broken links, slow pages, schema errors.
AI optimizes meta titles, descriptions, headers, and content structure for target keywords.
AI analyzes competitor rankings, content gaps, and backlink profiles automatically.
AI identifies link opportunities and generates outreach emails but relationship building needs humans.
With AI Overviews reshaping search, SEO strategy requires fundamental rethinking — deeply human.
Deciding what topics to pursue, content format, and editorial calendar needs audience understanding.

companies.name: Google
companies.threat: AI answers in search results reduce click-throughs to websites — existential threat to SEO

companies.name: Perplexity
companies.threat: AI search engine that answers questions directly, bypassing traditional search entirely

companies.name: Surfer SEO
companies.threat: AI that writes and optimizes SEO content, replacing specialist content optimization work

companies.name: Semrush
companies.threat: AI-powered SEO platform automating keyword research, auditing, and content optimization

companies.name: SearchGPT
companies.threat: AI-powered search that could redirect traffic away from traditional search engines

timeline.description: AI Overviews reduce organic clicks 20-30%. SEO shifts from keyword optimization to answer optimization. Content creation automated.
AI search becomes dominant. SEO evolves into 'AI visibility optimization.' Technical SEO stays relevant.
Traditional SEO as we know it may not exist. Specialists evolve into digital visibility strategists across AI and traditional channels.

skills.description: Optimize for AI search engines — a completely new discipline replacing traditional SEO.
Site architecture, page speed, and structured data — the technical foundation that endures.
Build brand authority that drives direct traffic — less dependent on search algorithms.
Earn media coverage and authoritative links — relationship-driven work AI can't replace.
Advanced attribution, traffic modeling, and business impact measurement beyond ranking reports.

email-marketer.title: Email Marketer
email-marketer.tagline: AI writes the emails. Humans design the relationship.

tasks.description: AI writes personalized email copy, subject lines, and CTAs optimized for open and click rates.
AI builds dynamic segments based on behavior, purchase history, and engagement patterns.
AI runs multi-variate tests on subject lines, content, timing, and auto-promotes winners.
AI builds and optimizes email sequences based on user behavior and lifecycle stage.
AI predicts optimal send time for each subscriber based on historical engagement data.
AI generates responsive email templates from brand guidelines and content briefs.
Mapping the customer journey and designing lifecycle touchpoints requires business understanding.
Managing sender reputation, compliance with CAN-SPAM/GDPR, and deliverability requires ongoing expertise.

companies.name: Klaviyo
companies.threat: AI-powered email and SMS marketing that auto-generates, segments, and optimizes campaigns

companies.name: Mailchimp
companies.threat: AI marketing platform that generates content, predicts performance, and optimizes send times

companies.name: HubSpot
companies.threat: AI email marketing integrated into CRM with predictive analytics and auto-personalization

companies.name: ActiveCampaign
companies.threat: AI-powered marketing automation that builds and optimizes email journeys

companies.name: Jasper
companies.threat: AI copywriting platform optimized for email subject lines and body copy

timeline.description: AI writes 80% of marketing emails. Email marketers shift to strategy and lifecycle design.
AI manages end-to-end email programs. Human role is CRM strategy and cross-channel orchestration.
Email marketing is fully automated. Remaining roles focus on customer lifecycle strategy and retention.

skills.description: Design end-to-end customer journeys across email, SMS, push — the strategic layer.
Connect marketing to revenue — attribution, LTV optimization, and business impact measurement.
Coordinate email with SMS, push, in-app, and ads — omnichannel marketing management.
Manage and optimize AI-powered marketing tools and workflows.
CAN-SPAM, GDPR, CCPA compliance — increasingly complex and legally required human oversight.

sdr-bdr.title: SDR / BDR (Sales Development)
sdr-bdr.tagline: AI sends the emails. But closing still takes a human.

tasks.description: AI scans LinkedIn, company databases, and intent signals to find and qualify leads automatically.
AI generates hyper-personalized outreach emails using prospect's company, role, and activity data.
AI scores leads based on fit, intent, and engagement — prioritizing the hottest opportunities.
AI manages multi-touch follow-up sequences with optimal timing and message variation.
AI handles calendar coordination, timezone management, and meeting reminders.
AI auto-logs calls, emails, and activities to CRM eliminating manual data entry.
AI voice agents handle initial cold calls but nuanced qualification conversations still need humans.
Building trust, understanding buyer motivations, and navigating politics requires human EQ.
Multi-stakeholder enterprise deals with political dynamics and competing priorities need human judgment.

companies.name: Clay
companies.threat: AI-powered data enrichment and personalized outreach at scale — the SDR workflow killer

companies.name: Apollo
companies.threat: End-to-end sales intelligence and outreach automation replacing SDR prospecting work

companies.name: 11x
companies.threat: Fully autonomous AI SDR that researches, personalizes, and sends outreach independently

companies.name: Artisan AI
companies.threat: AI-powered BDR that handles the entire outbound prospecting workflow

companies.name: Gong
companies.threat: AI revenue intelligence that analyzes calls and predicts deal outcomes

timeline.description: AI handles 70% of SDR workflow. Teams shrink 30-40%. Remaining SDRs focus on warm leads and phone calls.
AI SDRs handle full outbound prospecting. Human SDRs become relationship-focused account development reps.
The traditional SDR role largely ceases to exist. Sales teams are smaller, more senior, focused on complex enterprise deals.

skills.description: Move from volume outreach to strategic selling — understand pain points and build solutions.
Target and penetrate strategic accounts with multi-threaded, multi-channel approaches.
Technical product knowledge lets you qualify deeper and demo effectively — harder to automate.
Orchestrate AI tools to 10x your pipeline — be the AI-powered super-SDR, not the manual one.
Build genuine human connections that AI outreach can't replicate — the trust advantage.

market-research-analyst.title: Market Research Analyst
market-research-analyst.tagline: AI processes the data. Humans find the insight.

tasks.description: AI generates survey questions, handles distribution, and manages response collection.
AI scrapes, aggregates, and cleans market data from multiple sources automatically.
AI monitors competitor moves, pricing changes, and market shifts in real-time.
AI generates comprehensive market research reports with charts and executive summaries.
AI runs regression, clustering, and significance tests but interpreting results needs domain expertise.
AI identifies emerging trends from data patterns but understanding market implications needs human insight.
Focus groups, in-depth interviews, and ethnographic research require human connection and observation.
Translating research into business strategy requires understanding company goals and market dynamics.
Presenting findings persuasively and answering executive questions requires human communication skills.

companies.name: Perplexity
companies.threat: AI research assistant that aggregates and synthesizes market data instantly

companies.name: CB Insights
companies.threat: AI-powered market intelligence replacing manual competitive research and trend analysis

companies.name: Crayon
companies.threat: Automated competitive intelligence that monitors and analyzes competitors continuously

companies.name: Qualtrics
companies.threat: AI-powered survey and experience research that auto-analyzes and generates insights

companies.name: Anthropic
companies.threat: General-purpose AI that conducts market research and generates reports from prompts

timeline.description: AI automates 65% of data collection and analysis. Analysts focus on insight generation and strategy.
AI generates standard market research reports. Analysts become insight strategists and decision advisors.
Routine market research fully automated. Human analysts focus on qualitative research, strategic consulting, and novel methodologies.

skills.description: Translate research into business strategy — the high-value, hard-to-automate skill.
Focus groups, ethnography, and depth interviews — human connection-dependent research.
Causal inference, Bayesian analysis, and predictive modeling — beyond what basic AI tools offer.
Deep expertise in healthcare, fintech, SaaS, etc. — domain knowledge AI can't match.
Present findings as compelling narratives that drive executive decisions.
